name: 彼得·德萨加
bio_short: 德国（普鲁士）仪器制造师，海德堡大学的实验室技师。他与罗伯特·本生（Robert Bunsen）合作，在1855年设计并制造了第一台“本生灯”。
bio_short_en: A German (Prussian) instrument maker and laboratory technician at the University of Heidelberg. He collaborated with Robert Bunsen to design and build the first practical 'Bunsen burner' in 1855.
